meanings.sent1: She is labeling the boxes with different colors.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy labeling my belongings to keep them organized.
meanings.sent3: Labeling the jars with silly names always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness can be seen by labeling each item with care.
meanings.sent5: The teacher labeling the students' work made it easy to find.

meanings.sent1: Labeling the products correctly is crucial for customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent2: The machine is labeling the bottles swiftly and accurately.
meanings.sent3: He kept labeling everything he saw, creating a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The rain labeling the streets with puddles reflected the city lights beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The artist labeling the canvas with vibrant colors brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The act of attaching a label to something.
meanings.sent1: The labeling of ingredients on food packaging is important for allergies.
meanings.sent2: I always check the labeling on clothes to know how to wash them.
meanings.sent3: The labeling on the map was so tiny, it felt like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The labeling on the exhibit showcased the historical significance of each artifact.
meanings.sent5: The labeling on the switches helped me understand their functions easily.
